de.tub.util
Class FileUtil

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.util.FileUtil

public class FileUtil
extends Object

This class provides convenience methods for handling files.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke

Constructor Detail

FileUtil

public FileUtil()
Method Detail

acceptVisibleFilesFilter

public static FileFilter acceptVisibleFilesFilter(boolean acceptDirectories,
                                                  boolean acceptFiles)
Returns a FileFilter that filters out dot files (i.e., files starting with a '.') and accepts files and/or directories depending on the parameters acceptDirectories and acceptFiles.

Parameters:
acceptDirectories - if true visible directories are accepted, otherwise they are not
acceptFiles - if true visible files are accepted, otherwise they are not
Returns:
an instance of FileFilter

acceptOnlyClusterFilesFilter

public static FileFilter acceptOnlyClusterFilesFilter()
Returns a FileFilter that filters out all files that are no cluster files as generated by ELKI. Those are:
  • cluster-evaluation.txt,
  • clusterobjectorder.txt,
  • main.txt,
  • optics-clusterorder.txt and
  • xi-steep-areas.txt.
Hidden files are not accepted by this filter.

Returns:
an instance of FileFilter

ifNotExistCreateDir

public static boolean ifNotExistCreateDir(String dir)
Tests if a directory with the given path exists. If it does not it is created.

Parameters:
dir - the path to the directory to create.
Returns:
true if the directory could be created, otherwise false.

deleteFileOrDirectory

public static void deleteFileOrDirectory(String path)
Deletes the directory or file with the given path and all its children.

Parameters:
path - the name of the file to delete.

deleteFileOrDirectory

public static void deleteFileOrDirectory(File file)
Deletes the given directory or file and all its children.

Parameters:
file - the file to delete.
